error_GeneralError_IncorrectProject:
The project key you entered is not correct.
 Please double check and try again
error_GeneralError_Unknown:

error_ReaderError_IncorrectHostname:
The hostname you entered is not correct.
 Please double check the hostname and try again
error_ReaderError_CouldNotConnect:

The connection to the reader was lost.
Please check all connections and restart the application
error_ReaderError_Unknown:
An unknown error occurred in the application
Please check all connections and restart the reader and the application
